653.title: MS Home Corporation Act; include sexual orientation and gender identity as prohibited forms of discrimination under.
653.description: An Act To Amend Section 43-33-723, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Include Sexual Orientation And Gender Identity As Forms Of Discrimination Prohibited In Connection With Housing Developments And Eligible Loans Under The Mississippi Home Corporation Act; And For Related Purposes.

1343.title: Sexual orientation and gender identity; add to protected class for state discrimination.
1343.description: An Act To Amend Section 25-9-149, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Add Sexual Orientation And Gender Identity To The List Of People Protected As A Class From Discrimination Under State Law; And For Related Purposes.

2361.title: Mississippi Civil Rights Act; enact.
2361.description: An Act To Create The Mississippi Civil Rights Act; To Provide That The Right Of A Person To Be Free From Discrimination, Because Of Race, Color, Religion, National Origin, Immigrant Status, Sex, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, Disability, Or Familial Status Is A Civil Right; To Provide Remedies For Violations; And For Related Purposes.
